GioSettings.description: If TRUE, applications should not use the camera.
GioSettings.name: disable camera

GioSettings.description: If TRUE, applications should not use the microphone.
GioSettings.name: disable microphone

GioSettings.description: If TRUE, applications should not make sound.
GioSettings.name: disable sound output

GioSettings.description: If set to true, the system will make an effort to not divulge the user’s identity on screen or on the network.
GioSettings.name: hide identity

GioSettings.description: Consider trash and temporary files old after this many days.
GioSettings.name: old files age

GioSettings.description: If the underlying hardware has privacy screen support and this setting is enabled, the panels supporting this technology will be obscured from lateral view.
GioSettings.name: privacy screen

GioSettings.description: Recently used files will be remembered for this many days. If set to 0, recent files will not be remembered; if set to -1, they will be retained indefinitely.
GioSettings.name: recent files max age

GioSettings.description: If FALSE, application usage will not be monitored and recorded.
GioSettings.name: remember app usage

GioSettings.description: If FALSE, applications will not remember recently used files.
GioSettings.name: remember recent files

GioSettings.description: If TRUE, automatically remove temporary files when they are older than “old-files-age” days.
GioSettings.name: remove old temp files

GioSettings.description: If TRUE, automatically remove files from the trash when they are older than “old-files-age” days.
GioSettings.name: remove old trash files

GioSettings.description: If TRUE, anonymized reports will be sent automatically to the vendor.
GioSettings.name: report technical problems
USBGuard Service
GioSettings.description: If the USBGuard service is present and this setting is enabled, USB devices will be protected as configured in the usb-protection-level setting.

GioSettings.name: Show battery percentage
GioSettings.description: Show battery percentage in the top bar
